'''Radiant Spincrystal 20''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Whispering Plain]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]].
